name: Male literacy rate (Schofield (1973))
description: Percentage of men who signed their name in writing for marriage registers, for England. Original data for 1840 and 1842 gives the proportion of persons (in this case male) who signed the marriage register with marks (i.e. who were illiterate). To arrive at current estimates: % who are literate = 100 - (% who are illiterate).

source.name: Schofield (1973)
source.dataPublishedBy: Schofield, R.S., 1973. Dimensions of illiteracy, 1750â€“1850. Explorations in economic history, 10(4), pp.437-454.
source.dataPublisherSource: Annual report of the Registrar-General for England and Wales.
source.additionalInfo: Original data for 1840 and 1842 gives the proportion of persons who signed the marriage register with marks (i.e. who were illiterate). To arrive at current estimates: % who are literate = 100 - (% who are illiterate).
